author: Beth Skwarecki
title: What to Know About Aphasia (Besides That It Affects Your Speech)
description: Bruce Willis’ family wrote on Instagram that the actor will be retiring due to health issues, including most recently a diagnosis of aphasia. Aphasia is a disorder that can affect a person’s ability to communicate.Read more...
